title: Amityville: An Origin Story
overview: The story of the house at 112 Ocean Avenue in Amityville, NY has captivated horror fans for years. It's pretty unique story due the mix of horror and true crime. Amityville: An Origin Story focuses on the true crime aspect, which is a horror story on its own.This four part series will include interviews with family members, witnesses and former investigators of the murders, many of these people appearing for the first time in front of a camera.
